channel.title: Graduate School on Arthur Chen

item.title: First year at Waterloo
item.description:
Reflecting on My First Year as a Master’s Student at Waterloo

As I sit down to reflect on my first year as a master’s student at the University of Waterloo, I’m filled with immense gratitude for the incredible journey this past year has been. The transition from undergraduate studies to graduate research has been both challenging and deeply rewarding, and I feel incredibly fortunate for the opportunities that have come my way.
